interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5)
Review Date: 2020/08/07
Store: EASYDEW
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'}
Review Text: I am in love with skin care, more than ever in my life now that I in my 50s. I truly wish I started in my earlier years. And the newest & most exciting things in skin care are Korean skin care products. I had heard they were the best so I was excited to see this 2-step product & even more excited to try it. I will admit, I am a bit obsessed with face masks at the moment. I use a mask every day, especially during this pandemic while I am stuck at home & not able to go to a cosmetologist for a facial. I have aged & have dry skin with lots of fine wrinkles appearing around the corners of my eyes and a deep nasolabial fold forming. I am saddened every time Iook at my reflection in the mirror. I absolutely love this 2-step product. I opened one end of the product & applied the small masks to my eyes & around my mouth (4 to a pack) and then applied the whole face mask (step 2) over it all. I left them all on according to the directions and my face felt amazing afterwards. I was so pleased with the way my face felt that I was already looking forward to the next time I used this product. Btw, my face is very sensitive to skin care products & this particular product did not cause me any redness, irritation,  peeling or burning.  I would not hesitate to purchase this product in the future for a regular skin care regiment.
Review Title: Awesome product, great results!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Enthusiast**: Strong passion for skincare, particularly in exploring and utilizing products that cater to aging skin.
- **Focus on Anti-Aging**: Significant concern for anti-wrinkle solutions and hydration, specifically for fine lines and dry skin.
- **Korean Skin Care Advocate**: Enthusiasm for Korean skincare products, perceiving them as innovative and effective.
- **Routine-Oriented**: Regular use of face masks, with a current habit of daily application to maintain skin health during periods of limited professional skincare treatments.
- **Sensitive Skin Friendly**: Preference for products that are gentle and free from irritants, as sensitive skin has been a challenge.
- **Positive Response to Results**: Motivated by effective results and experiences that enhance skin texture and overall feel, often leading to anticipation of future product use.

This summary reflects a user dedicated to improving their skincare routine while prioritizing quality and gentle formulas suited to their specific skin concerns.
